name: 4 Wheels Mayhem 3D - Top Monster Truck Racing Game
name_original: 4 Wheels Mayhem 3D - Top Monster Truck Racing Game
description:
With No rules, no boundaries 4 Wheels Mayhem goes for pure fun with adrenaline pumping thrills. As you go along this game brings you an excitement of unveiling next level of challenge. 100% total freedom to Drive across the varied terrains without any limitations. With Extremely realistic vehicle physics and accurate suspension, mass, torque, friction and advanced physics for many smaller objects just fire up your engines and get ready to sling mud through over 20+ levels in this complete physics based 4 Wheels Mayhem.

10 Incredible trucks to wow the crowds
23 Levels and more coming soon
Gorgeous Graphics
Unlimited jump power
Store to purchase new Monster Cars
Smooth gameplay
An addictive pick-up-and-play 3D Game.
Head-banging soundtrack
